warning.delete.area: Every station, device, process, and event belonging to the area will also be deleted.
warning.delete.process: Every event belonging to the process will also be deleted.
warning.delete.rootcause: This will not detach the root cause from any event it is currently linked to. You will need to do this manually from the Events page.
warning.delete.site: Every area, station, device, process, and event belonging to the site will also be deleted.
warning.delete.station: Every device belonging to the station will also be deleted.
